languages.text: {n}Пират пыхтя поднимается с колен, пытаясь прикрыть пятно на штанах.{/n} "К-конечно, В-ваша Светлость. Это п-правильно. Держите нас в страхе богобоязненном, чтобы мы, сквернавцы, и дурнопомыслить не могли!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Пират пыхтя поднимается с колен, пытаясь прикрывать руками мокрое пятно на своих штанах.{/n} "К-конечно, В-ваша Светлость, хорошо вы меня подловили. П-простите, что разочаровал вас, б-буду работать над стойкостью, да!"
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: {n}The pirate gets up from his knees, huffing and trying to cover the stain on his breeches.{/n} "Of c-course, Your L-{mf|Lord|Lady}ship. M-most appropriate. Keep us in pious fear so that we have nary an ill thought, corruptuous as we are!"
languages.original_text: {n}Пират пыхтя поднимается с колен, пытаясь прикрыть пятно на штанах.{/n} "К-конечно, В-ваша Светлость. Это п-правильно. Держите нас в страхе богобоязненном, чтобы мы, сквернавцы, и дурнопомыслить не могли!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The pirate gets up from his knees, huffing and trying to cover the stain on his breeches.{/n} "Of c-course, Your L-{mf|Lord|Lady}ship. M-most appropriate. Keep us in pious fear so that we have nary an ill thought, corruptuous as we are!"
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: {n}跪在地上的海盗哼哼唧唧地站了起来，试图掩饰马裤上的污渍。{/n}“当、当然，大人！这、这真是再合适不过了！让我们保持虔诚的敬畏，这样哪怕是我们这样的堕坏之人，也不会产生任何邪恶的念头！”
languages.original_text: {n}The pirate gets up from his knees, huffing and trying to cover the stain on his breeches.{/n} "Of c-course, Your L-{mf|Lord|Lady}ship. M-most appropriate. Keep us in pious fear so that we have nary an ill thought, corruptuous as we are!"

traits.locale_text: {n}跪在地上的海盗哼哼唧唧地站了起来，试图掩饰马裤上的污渍。{/n}“当、当然，大人！这、这真是再合适不过了！让我们保持虔诚的敬畏，这样哪怕是我们这样的堕坏之人，也不会产生任何邪恶的念头！”
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: {n}海賊は立ち上がり、ハァハァと息をしながらズボンの染みを隠した。{/n}「も、もちろんです、陛下！それが一番です！わ、私達を敬虔な恐怖のどん底に叩き込んでください！そして、腐敗した私たちに闇黒の考えを与えてください！」
languages.original_text: {n}The pirate gets up from his knees, huffing and trying to cover the stain on his breeches.{/n} "Of c-course, Your L-{mf|Lord|Lady}ship. M-most appropriate. Keep us in pious fear so that we have nary an ill thought, corruptuous as we are!"

traits.locale_text: {n}海賊は立ち上がり、ハァハァと息をしながらズボンの染みを隠した。{/n}「も、もちろんです、陛下！それが一番です！わ、私達を敬虔な恐怖のどん底に叩き込んでください！そして、腐敗した私たちに闇黒の考えを与えてください！」
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: {n}El pirata se levanta resoplando y trata de cubrir la mancha de sus pantalones.{/n} «Por s-supuesto, m-mi{mf|lord|lady}. M-muy buena idea. M-mantenernos en alerta para que no tengamos ni un mal pensamiento, corruptos como somos».
languages.original_text: {n}The pirate gets up from his knees, huffing and trying to cover the stain on his breeches.{/n} "Of c-course, Your L-{mf|Lord|Lady}ship. M-most appropriate. Keep us in pious fear so that we have nary an ill thought, corruptuous as we are!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El pirata se levanta resoplando y trata de cubrir la mancha de sus pantalones.{/n} «Por s-supuesto, m-mi{mf|lord|lady}. M-muy buena idea. M-mantenernos en alerta para que no tengamos ni un mal pensamiento, corruptos como somos».
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: {n}Der Pirat erhebt sich keuchend von den Knien und versucht dabei den nassen Fleck auf seiner Hose zu verbergen.{/n} "N-Natürlich, Eure L-{mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. V-Vollkommen angemessen. Haltet uns nur schön in frommer Furcht, damit wir keine bösen Gedanken bekommen, korruptös wie wir sind!"
languages.original_text: {n}The pirate gets up from his knees, huffing and trying to cover the stain on his breeches.{/n} "Of c-course, Your L-{mf|Lord|Lady}ship. M-most appropriate. Keep us in pious fear so that we have nary an ill thought, corruptuous as we are!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Pirat erhebt sich keuchend von den Knien und versucht dabei den nassen Fleck auf seiner Hose zu verbergen.{/n} "N-Natürlich, Eure L-{mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. V-Vollkommen angemessen. Haltet uns nur schön in frommer Furcht, damit wir keine bösen Gedanken bekommen, korruptös wie wir sind!"
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: {n}Le pirate se relève, à bout de souffle après avoir débité toute sa tirade d'un trait, tout en essayant de cacher les traces de souillure sur son pantalon.{/n} « B-Bien sûr, Votre S-Seigneurie. V-Vous avez bien fait. Faut nous inspirer une peur pieuse pour qu'on reste sur le droit chemin malgré notre corruptitude ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The pirate gets up from his knees, huffing and trying to cover the stain on his breeches.{/n} "Of c-course, Your L-{mf|Lord|Lady}ship. M-most appropriate. Keep us in pious fear so that we have nary an ill thought, corruptuous as we are!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le pirate se relève, à bout de souffle après avoir débité toute sa tirade d'un trait, tout en essayant de cacher les traces de souillure sur son pantalon.{/n} « B-Bien sûr, Votre S-Seigneurie. V-Vous avez bien fait. Faut nous inspirer une peur pieuse pour qu'on reste sur le droit chemin malgré notre corruptitude ! »
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: {n}Soluk soluğa ayağa kalkan korsan, kıçındaki lekeyi gizlemeye çalışıyor.{/n} "P... Pek tabii L... {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. G... Gayet makul. Yoğuz da olsak imanın kamçısı varken aklımızın ucundan tek günah geçmez!"
languages.original_text: {n}The pirate gets up from his knees, huffing and trying to cover the stain on his breeches.{/n} "Of c-course, Your L-{mf|Lord|Lady}ship. M-most appropriate. Keep us in pious fear so that we have nary an ill thought, corruptuous as we are!"
